TopicTitle: Write about your daily thoughts and events!

Articles.Content:
I often felt like there was no place where I could write about life and express my daily thoughts without starting whole threads. So I made a thread for it!

I'll start:

The majority of what I design in KSP is crafts that I ambitiously thought could be uploaded toa craft company one day.

The only thing stopping me from creating a craft company is the logo.

I often get frustrated that just when I end my session of playing KSP, all the creative thoughts and ideas pop up in my head. Great timing!

I feel sad that Parks and Recreation is over.
Isn't there a blog function for this?
This one's for brief, off-topic posts, sort of like "tweets".

As a custom planets maker, Outer Planets Mod makes me insanely jealous. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Why are there seniors in my math class? Am I really that good?

Can everyone just stop making FNaF threads already? I was the first, and it's getting annoying! ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)

The day version 0.20 comes out for Seed of Andromeda I will die from playing the game too much.
